name: MPRWeather
0:
”Alexa, open MPR Weather”
”Alexa, play MPR Weather”
”Alexa, start MPR Weather”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: m. p. r. weather
des: Upon opening MPR Weather Skill, a user will set their region to one of the seven Minnesota weather regions. Once this region is set, a user will be able to hear an audio clip with the weather forecast from MPR News. Additionally, when there are significant weather events underway, MPR News will provide another audio clip with a deeper look at current weather in Minnesota. Before closing the skill, the user will have the option to tune into MPR News stream.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
